Token.Abstract: This class implements MBML functions for accessing Mockingbird runtime environment information.
Returns an array of the full pathnames of the MBML files that have been loaded into the current Mockingbird environment.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing the paths of the files that have been loaded into the current environment.

Token.Abstract: Returns an array of the names (i.e., the lastPathComponents of the file paths) for the files that have been loaded into the current Mockingbird environment.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array containing the names of the files that have been loaded into the current environment.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether an MBML file with the given pathname has been loaded into the current Mockingbird environment.

Parameter.Name: pathName
Parameter.Abstract: The full pathname of the file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: @YES if the specified file has been loaded into the current environment, @NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether a given MBML file has been loaded into the current Mockingbird environment.

ReturnValue.Abstract: @YES if the specified file has been loaded into the current environment, @NO otherwise.
